text:
ADMINISTRATIVE
Ref.: JM/1V773
EUROPEAN BROADCASTING UNION (E.B.U.)
UNION EUROPIiENNE DE RADIODIFFUSION (U. E. R.)
OFFICE
GENEVA, 13th April 1957
1, rue de Varembe
Mrs« Judith Gans,
Secretary,
N.A.E .B.
li; Gregory Hall,
Urbana,
Illinois•
Dear Madam,
In reply to your letter of 8th April,
concerning our subscription to the NAEB-TV Research
Fact Sheets, the position is that we receive all
NAEB publications free of charge as the NAEB is a
member of this Union* In return the NAEB regularly
receives free copies of our publications *
We are very interested in the Research Fact
Sheets and certainly wish to continue to receive them.
Yours faithfully,
(Mrs.) J. Marriott
TELEPHONE : 66 h 0 35-TELEGRAPHIC ADDRESS : UNIRADIO GENEVA
(022) 33 74 60 - CASE POSTALE GENEVE 20 MONTBRILLANT
TELEX 22.230
